clues.text: In 1975 he became the 1st president to attend a performance at Ford's Theatre since Lincoln's assassination
The 1st president who'd been a justice of the peace, he served in Fairfax County in 1770

He was the 1st veteran of the U.S. Navy to serve as president

rounds.comments: (Alex: And that's what you have to do.)

rounds.text: He said a 2009 exhibit was the 1st time taxpayers' money was used "to hang my pictures up rather than scrape them off"
